paper.title: Salience-Driven Text Planning
paper.venue: International Conference on Natural Language Generation
paper.abstract: We present an algorithm for hierarchical text planning of paragraphs involving object descriptions, comparisons and recommendations. Building on previous work on bottom-up text planning and user-tailored text generation, we develop a numerical model of ‘propositional salience’ to capture both speaker’s intentions and local coherence in a single framework for generating complex discourse structures.
